mapper.insert: insert into t_wp_data (v_equipment_name, v_motor_status, v_motor_temp, v_motor_speed, d_longitude, d_latitude, i_work_model, i_work_status) values (#{v_equipment_name}, #{v_motor_status}, #{v_motor_temp}, #{v_motor_speed}, #{d_longitude}, #{d_latitude}, #{i_work_model}, #{i_work_status})
